body: To all innocent souls that have stumbled into this comment section, If you are reading this, you are immune to all current or future curses on this site. Copy and paste this to 5 other manga, so others may be saved as well. I'm doing this to help y'all out. Stay safe everyone.

I think i've seen something like this one, punishment for bad grades by student council, it has many parts and the MC is a boy. I forgot if it's anime or hentai, but I wonder if anyone can help me find the sauce for that one?

Lots of inconsistencies in the dialog that makes me a tad confused.  Is the girl's name "Shino-chan" or "Morimachi-san"?  Why does the boy need to ask permission to stick it in after he's already stolen her first kiss and eaten her out?  Why does one of the boys respond "Prez, that's dangerous" after she suggested they cut the new girl some slack?  If he's talking about the tit job she's giving him, the statement seems misplaced.  That's not the only things, but the ones that bug me the most.  Everything else is solid stuff.
Part 2 please. Thank God this wasn't a shita
